name: Genashtim
description: Leveraging Technology and the Internet to Connect Marginalised Communities to the Global Economy. We provide online learning and online support services. In 2015, Genashtim was the 2nd company to be certified as a B Corp in Southeast Asia. We have been named “Best for the World” amongst B Corps every year since. We are also rated Platinum under the Global Impact Investment Rating System (GIIRS). Leveraging Technology and the Internet to Connect Marginalised Communities to the Global Economy.
